snippet: Mr. Bergman was a founding member of the surrealist comedy troupe Firesign Theater, whose albums became cult favorites among college students in the late 1960s and ’70s.
abstract: Peter Bergman, a founding member of the surrealist comedy troupe Firesign Theater, whose albums became cult favorites among college students in the late 1960s and ’70s, dies at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bergman was a founding member of the surrealist comedy troupe Firesign Theater, whose albums became cult favorites among college students in the late 1960s and ’70s.

headline.seo: Peter Bergman, Satirist at Firesign Theater, Dies at 72
headline.main: Peter Bergman, Satirist With the Firesign Theater, Dies at 72
headline.print_headline: Peter Bergman, Satirist With Firesign, Dies at 72
